ecoSystemSection.mainText: Towards A Secure And Reliable Financial Future
ecoSystemSection.subText: Develocity strives to create a safe and trustworthy crypto environment where investors and developers can interact securely, considering the transparent credibility and technical measures and standards.
ecoSystemSection.subTextSecondParagraph: The main goal of DeVelocity is to provide useful decentralized tools that would be trusted entirely and transparent, where the traders will always be able to trade freely without any risk of being locked out or exposed.

academySection.mainText: Your Gateway to Understand Crypto and Blockchain
academySection.subText: We just launched the first vision of crypto academy, which is focused on rising awareness about the cryptocurrency, blockchain technology and it's benefits in general.
academySection.subTextSecondParagraph: On the second phase crypto academy will focus on bringing well known people from different kinds of companies based on blockchain industry and you'll abeable to learn directly from them.

scannerSection.subText: DeFi users are always trying to find the ideal investment, and they are willing to take the risk; even if they try as much as they can to reduce the risk, they won’t be able to determine the size of the risk. This is the part where we can benefit the user the most, where all he needs to do is avoid participating in any investment without understanding what kind of risk he is getting into.
scannerSection.subTextSecondParagraph: The multi-functional tool comes to help the users with their challenges by scanning the contract or searching for the token to get a quick and deep detailed report about the token.

roadmapSection.mainTextSubstring: Develocity aspires to present its final project in four primary stages. Each stage is presented separately and merged in the post-final stage to create a decentralised platform, which would be distinctively in terms of technology and development based on Web 3.0.

quote.mainText: “In accordance with our principles and aspirations in the world of cryptocurrencies and with a focus on decentralization based on the fact that innovation has no limits, that the innovator's mind is a rich mine of ideas, and that pushes us to reach higher places, our creative ideas compete in 'Develocity' to provide customized services and unique solutions in financial decentralization. Develocity provides an integrated, safe, reliable, and credible experience. We promise to adapt our services, our potential, and our experience to enhance your experience in the world of financial technology.”
quote.subText: Marwan bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

leadershipSection.subText: With the mindset to create secure future in the digital money.

partnershipSection.subText: We have connected with amazing people, businesses, and organizations for the past 2 years.

quote.mainText: “We entrepreneurs are loners, vagabonds, troublemakers. Success is simply a matter of finding and surrounding ourselves with those open-minded and clever souls who can take our insanity and put it to good use.”
quote.name: Brian Armstrong
quote.title: CEO of Coinbase

blogSection.subText: News, Updates, And Useful Content From Across The Develocity Ecosystem.

cards.mainText: We Are Launching App For Multi-Functional Tool
cards.subText: The Multi-Functional Tool for scanning crypto tokens provides users with a secure and reliable way of accessing detailed information on multiple tokens in the cryptocurrency market. These features provide users with peace of mind as they access, analyze, and monitor the current state of the tokens and ensure that their assets are always safe and secure.

cards.mainText: Discover The Business Solutions We Have For You
cards.subText: Develocity business solutions gives you the ability to reach the farthest limits
cards.span: 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.
